title: Excision and Recovery: Enhancing Surface Anomaly Detection with Attention-based Single Deterministic Masking. (arXiv:2310.04010v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Anomaly detection (AD) in surface inspection is an essential yet challenging task in manufacturing due to the quantity imbalance problem of scarce abnormal data.
